mapper.update: UPDATE public.lol_summoner_league SET league_id = #{leagueId}, tier = #{tier}, rank = #{rank}, league_points = #{leaguePoints}, wins = #{wins}, losses = #{losses}, hot_streak = #{hotStreak}, veteran = #{veteran}, fresh_blood = #{freshBlood}, inactive = #{inactive}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE summoner_id = #{summonerId} AND queue_type = #{queueType};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO public.lol_summoner_league ( league_id, summoner_id, queue_type, tier, rank, league_points, wins, losses, hot_streak, veteran, fresh_blood, inactive ) VALUES ( #{leagueId}, -- league_id #{summonerId}, -- summoner_id #{queueType}, -- queue_type #{tier}, -- tier #{rank}, -- rank #{leaguePoints}, -- league_points #{wins}, -- wins #{losses}, -- losses #{hotStreak}, -- hot_streak #{veteran}, -- veteran #{freshBlood}, -- fresh_blood #{inactive} -- inactive ) ON CONFLICT (summoner_id, queue_type) DO UPDATE SET league_id = #{leagueId}, tier = #{tier}, rank = #{rank}, league_points = #{leaguePoints}, wins = #{wins}, losses = #{losses}, hot_streak = #{hotStreak}, veteran = #{veteran}, fresh_blood = #{freshBlood}, inactive = #{inactive}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
mapper.select: WITH MostPlayedChamp AS ( SELECT lmp.puuid, lmp.champ_name, lc.name_kr, COUNT(*) as play_count, COUNT(CASE WHEN is_win = true THEN 1 END) as win_count, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY lmp.puuid ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) as rn FROM lol_match_participant lmp left outer join lol_champion lc on (lmp.champ_name = lc.name_us) WHERE lmp.puuid = #{puuid} GROUP BY lmp.puuid, lmp.champ_name, lc.name_kr HAVING COUNT(*) > 0 ) SELECT mpc.champ_name as name_us, mpc.name_kr, mpc.play_count, mpc.win_count, ROUND(mpc.win_count * 100.0 / mpc.play_count, 0) as win_rate FROM MostPlayedChamp mpc WHERE mpc.rn <= #{limit} GROUP BY mpc.puuid, mpc.champ_name, mpc.name_kr, mpc.play_count, mpc.win_count, mpc.rn ORDER BY mpc.puuid, mpc.play_count DESC
